item.description:
The next ALL DAY CROP as the Tall Grass Golf Course in Shoreham is set for February 5th!
ALL DAY 10 HOUR CROP
at Evergreen at
Tall Golf Course and Country Club

Youâ€™re invited to a 10 hour
Scrapbooking and Papercrafting event!

When: Saturday, February 5, 2011
Where: The Evergreen at the Tall Grass Golf Course and Country Club
24 Cooper Street
Shoreham, NY 11786
Time: 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.
Price: $40.00 includes coffee and light breakfast in the morning and dinner provided by Evergreen restaurant.
***CRICUT Station and Tool Table available for use***

Contact: Jodi Cahill at jocahill@optonline.net or (631) 379-8028


Name:
Address:
Phone: Email:
I am coming with a friend and would like to sit with:

Fee enclosed (check made out to CASH) per person:
$40 (no lunch) $ 45 (lunch included)
Early bird postmarked by 12/1/10 gets a FREE raffle ticket!

Send registration form and payment to:
Jodi Cahill
55 Sherwood Drive
Shoreham NY, 11786
Please register by January 30, 2011. (Sorry no refunds after 1/30/11).
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there to greet you at the door!
item.name: 10 Hour Crop!
